JOSEPH MERCOLA $25,000 $10,000 $2,500 $10,000 $2,500 RICH PRODUCTS $225,000 ABBOTT NUTRITION $3,918 Prop 37: Your right to know. As Goes California, So Goes the Nation. GMOs: Corporate Charlatans Versus Organic Heroes Democratic and Republican administrations, and Congress, have repeatedly ignored the overwhelming majority of Americans who favor labeling genetically engineered (GE) food in the marketplace. Our politi- cians seem to be listening to the corporate executives (donors) instead of the citizenry. But in California, the people have a right to cra laws of their choosing. Proposition 37, on the ballot in California on November 6, would mandate labeling of foods containing GE ingredients. If we win this ght in California, manufactur- ers will likely begin to label food nationally for GE ingredients. Please make your voice heard by signing the petition at cornucopia.org ALEX BOGUSKY [FEARLESS REVOLUTION] ($100,000), MICHAEL FUNK ( $50,000), PRESENCE MARKETING ($20,000), BURROUGHS FAMILY FARM ($5,000), BAKER CREEK HEIRLOOM SEEDS ($4,000), MINTWOOD MEDIA COLLECTIVE ( $1,250) COUNSEL FOR BIOTECHNOLOGY INFORMATION (DONATED $375,000), GROCERY MANUFACTURERS ASSOCIATION ($375,000), BIOTECHNOLOGY INDUSTRY ORGANIZATION : ($250,000) vs.
